name: Crusadia Draco
effectText: You can Special Summon this card (from your hand) in Defense Position to your zone a Link Monster points to. You can only Special Summon "Crusadia Draco" once per turn this way. If this card is Normal or Special Summoned to a zone a Link Monster points to: You can target 1 "Crusadia" card in your GY, except "Crusadia Draco"; add it to your hand. You can only use this effect of "Crusadia Draco" once per turn.
